attributes.action: Prevent the unlawful production of Halal meat - respect for animal rights.
attributes.additional_details: Denmark has recently implemented a ban on Halal meat and its reasons for doing so are outlined here: http://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/europe/denmark-bans-halal-and-kosher-slaughter-as-minister-says-animal-rights-come-before-religion-9135580.html
attributes.background: The the UK Halal meat production is permitted and flies in the face of the regulations that prevent the suffering of animals. This is a gross misjustice and needs to be addressed.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104590

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
